document_data.name: Treatise of Sublimated Oneiromancy
document_data.author: [[Tasirin]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Treatise of Sublimated Oneiromancy''''' was a book by the [[archmage]] [[Tasirin]].The ''Dragon'' article contains a disclaimer that not all the books it lists are necessarily written by a given spell inventor, and could instead be written by an apprentice or relative.
document_data.Description: The book detailed several [[spell]]s, including ''[[sleep]]'', ''[[dream]]'', ''[[feign death]]'', and ''[[Tasirin's haunted sleep]]''.
